## Anatomy

### A study protocol

Sr |Element   |   Purpose |
---|-------|------------
1  |<b>Research questions</b>    |   What questions will the study address?  |
2  |Significance (Background)   |   Why are these questions important?  |
3  |Design  |   How is the study structured?  |
3a   |Time frame | |
3b   |Epidemiologic approach | |
4  | Subjects   | Who are the subjects and how will they be selected? |
4a | Selection criteria | |
4b | Sampling design    | |
5  | Variables          | What measurements will be made? |
5a | Predictor variables | |
5b | Confounding variables | |
5c | Outcome variables     | |
6  | Statistical issues    | How large is the study and how will it be analyzed? |
6a | Hypotheses           | |
6b | Sample size          | |
6c | Analytic approach    | |
